items.sentence: Tom was beaten up when he came to the aid of one of his friends who was being bullied.
Were you able to make it to the station on time to catch the first train this morning?
When I was a little boy, my father and I went to Boston to visit my great-grandfather.
When Tom comes to Boston, he usually stays at a hotel, but sometimes he stays with us.
Having done that with Tom before, I knew that he wouldn\'t be able to do it very well.
